snippet: The police said an 88-year-old man set fire to his house and fatally shot a volunteer reserve police officer who responded; the man was then was killed by a SWAT team.
abstract: Police in Oregon say they believe Lawrence Cambra set fire to his house and shot Robert Libke, volunteer reserve police officer, before being killed by SWAT team.
lead_paragraph: The police said an 88-year-old man set fire to his house and fatally shot a volunteer reserve police officer who responded; the man was then was killed by a SWAT team.

headline.main: Oregon: Man, 88, Is Blamed in Officer’s Death
headline.print_headline: Oregon: Police Say Man, 88, Killed Officer Who Responded To House Fire
